block_comment: This block of code is responsible for assigning specific values to the elements of the 'out' array. Specifically, it maps values from the variables 'tempo1', 'tempo2', 'tempo3', and 'tempo4' to the array 'out[3]', 'out[2]', 'out[1]', and 'out[0]' respectively. This is done using the 'assign' keyword which establishes continuous assignments, essentially defining the value of 'out' elements in terms of the tempo variables.
